plays.text: Penalty to Theo Fleury 2 minutes for Roughing Mike Fisher
Penalty to Chris Herperger 2 minutes for Roughing MIKAEL SAMUELSSON
Penalty to Shane Hnidy 2 minutes for Interference Steve McKenna
Goal scored by Zdeno Chara unassisted
Penalty to Marian Hossa 2 minutes for Holding the Stick(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Theo Fleury assisted by Brian Leetch and Mike York
Penalty to Magnus Arvedson 2 minutes for Slashing Radek Dvorak
Penalty to Bryan Berard 2 minutes for Roughing Chris Neil
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Ivan Ciernik
Penalty to Radek Bonk 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Eric Lindros
Goal scored by Theo Fleury assisted by Vladimir Malakhov and Brian Leetch
Penalty to Igor Ulanov 2 minutes for Tripping Martin Havlat
Penalty to Martin Havlat 2 minutes for Holding(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Daniel Alfredsson 10 minutes for Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Radek Bonk 2 minutes for Crosschecking David Karpa
Penalty to MIKAEL SAMUELSSON 2 minutes for Tripping(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Wade Redden assisted by Daniel Alfredsson and Radek Bonk
Goal scored by Petr Nedved assisted by Matthew Barnaby
